title: Thank God Leblanc isn't part of the assassin rework, Thank you Riot.
body:
As someone who plays mid alot, Leblanc is a Niche pick, only the goods Leblanc can reign terror just like Shaco.
Alot of people in low elo keep saying that she doesn't have counterplay.
The counterplay is THERE, you just have to wear Glasses.
The longer a player play against Leblanc the better they get.
Back when I first started League I was scared of Leblanc, but as I started playing her more and more I realize that she isn't that scary after all.
She is rewarded for doing the Right plays and punished for doing the wrong plays.
Although even if she does the wrong plays, you gotta pray that the enemies would fall off for her Clone.

Now I'm not scared of Leblanc, I can play Ziggs, Karthus, Xerath any champion and can still stand on my own against her lane bullying.
She is very Item Dependant and is easely shutdown by building 1 MR item.
I always say this,
If you build 1 MR item and you manage to survive her full burst you can retaliate. (Unless she has ignite)

Gameplay wise:
Alot of youtubers high elo thinks she is what an assassins should be.

1. Kill Priority Target and GET OUT.
2. Slippery.
3. High Single Target Damage.
4. Mobility.
5. Fun to Play

She is played alot in the LCS because of her Reliability, she has a fair winrate and even if she has a positive score, she doesn't always win games.

Leblanc taught me how to CS with auto attack.

If you want an assassin to play you should try Leblanc, she has a low skillfloor and endless skillcap.

I hate to bust your bubbles, but if something is perfectly designed, they should be able to nerf and buff the champion without said change utterly destroying them or pushing them so far over the limits that they're permabanned. LeBlanc is far, far from "perfectly balanced" exactly because of this. This is why she will need some changes, to pull her in line with a modern kit design that will allow them to nerf and buff accordingly without wrecking her or the Rift.

Leblanc Kit itself is unique there is no champion like Leblanc. She Dash, she doesn't Blink like Kassadin and Zed, she doesn't have invicibility like Fizz E. She is perfectly designed and should not be touched at all, she is the Pearl of League just like Heimerdinger. Unique champion that cannot be replicated. Vel koz was perfectly designed and you see what they did to him, There is no Perfection you can only Achieve what you have aimed. The creator of Leblanc Achieved what he aimed, a unique champion.
Zed has kit stolen from LEblanc, like his WW, unecessary % passive, AD ratio bonus passive on his W.

You missed my point. She's not perfect because she's volatile. Any change has dramatic effects on her, good or bad. That isn't perfection. Sure, she's unique, but her kit design is ancient, from a time where most kits were still fairly experimental and they didn't have as much grasp on the overarching view of game health. A kit like hers wouldn't be designed today just because of how prone to being godlike or garbage it is. She has to have changes to bring her in line and achieve stability. Her most unique parts of her kit are the passive, W, and R. They can easily scrap the Q (Katarina, Kennen copycat) and E (Karma, Morgana copycat) for better tools that can lead to her being an easily balanced champion.

Assassins aren't a balanced role and has never been a role. It is a role that is only owned by players who have been honing their skills with them. They always have the lowest Winrate and should be a Niche picks. Leblanc has option to assassinate the priority target, if one of her option is impossible to do she can do it another way. The thing with Leblanc is that her Kit synergize together, nerfing or buffing could make a big change to her. A champion that has a Kit that doesn't synergize together are like Kog maw, Aurelion Sol, Taliyah. Why get Kog Q? while his WER are much more useful to max 1st. Aurelion Sol is just too Ackward to use his E is probably useless because of the Telegraph and the passive on his E is only good because it offers movement speed. Taliyah has a Role problem, is she a kiting champion, a poke champion, a chasing champion? There is nothing that really defines her besides throwing rocks. 

I don't Really think Leblanc Q or E are copycats because they do bring unique gameplay to Leblanc, unlike Katarina morgana.
Leblanc Q, she can decide to Q again W or E.
She can E then E to Stun lock a tank charging at your ADC.
Katarina Q and she goes all QERW full button smashing combo.
Morgana QW, And then Press R and sits next to you auto attacking you. No zhonya you die, very horrible in her kit.
